mapper.select: SELECT comment_no, study_comment.member_no, username, content, study_comment.created_date, parent_comment_no, layer FROM study_comment JOIN member ON study_comment.member_no = member.member_no WHERE study_no = #{studyNo} ORDER BY parent_comment_no ASC, layer ASC, comment_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_comment (member_no, study_no, parent_comment_no, content) VALUES(#{memberNo}, #{studyNo}, (SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()+1), #{content})
